relation: One of the lead EB64 characters. I later added an orange background, which I thought worked better.
An abstracted version of EB64's Flint.
EarthBound 64's Flint, looking more "Clint Eastwood" than ever. All he needs is a cigar, different colours and a woolen poncho.
keep in mind that as I drew this, I had still not yet played Mother 3. As a result, it may be more akin to a fusion of new Flint and EB64 Flint. Well, maybe.
